string.name: micloud_space_full_influence
string.u: What happens when I run out of space?

resources.string: to store and access your files from anywhere
When your Mi Cloud is full…
"New items won't be synced with Mi Cloud."

"All your photos, video, notes, and apps will remain backed up in the cloud.
In questo modo, se smarrisci o danneggi il tuo dispositivo, i tuoi dati saranno ancora al sicuro..
Quando il tuo cloud è pieno, i tuoi vecchi dati non andranno da nessuna parte. Comunque, qualsiasi nuovo contenuto che aggiungerai (ad es. foto, video, note, e app) non sarà sincronizzato.
To fix this, you can either clean out some old files to make room for new ones, or you can purchase additional storage space."
Lock or wipe this device remotely.
View and manage your data from anywhere
An SMS will be sent to bind your SIM card with this account. You will incur regular charges from your carrier.
